message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but that's a bit unfair. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  Time is ticking, and we both lose if this drags on.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. 58-42 is as low as I'm willing to go for now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every wasted round. I'm offering you a 48/52 split. It's more than fair considering the time pressure. Let's be reasonable and end this.
I understand your frustration, but I still believe I deserve the bigger share. I'm willing to meet you in the middle of our previous offers. 56-44 is my final compromise.
